BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #279 from webpigeon/issue-232 Recognize CC licenses with https URLs (fixes #232)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #259 from dineshkrishnareddy/dinesh/fix_search_endpoint_error fixed API endpoint for search podcast (fix #241)
